title: Yagate Itoshiki Tablecloth
original_name: やがて愛しきテーブルクロス
sinopse:
After a certain incident a freeloader came to live in his house. But... He still lives with his parents! How will they manage to find get on together and will love have a chance to bloom in this situation?

Included one-shots: Neapolitan Etude
